# Blog logo with `hexSticker`

```{r}
#| label: load_packages
library(hexSticker)
library(magrittr)
```

## File names

```{r}
#| label: file names
file_image <- "lightning_icon_white.png"
file_name <- "logo.png"
```


## Create sticker

```{r}
#| label: create sticker
file_image %>%
  sticker(package = '[ENERGYCODE]',
          p_size = 19,
          p_y = 1.3, 
          h_fill = 'black',
          h_color = 'grey',
          s_x = 1,
          s_y = 0.7,
          filename = file_name)
```
